topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
Ok guys, seriously what the heck did you all do

Instead of just all flipping our crap let's sit down and have a _decent_ discussion on what we want to do to resolve this situation, making a whole new thread honestly doesn't seem like the right way to go about this. It's just going to happen all over again, making a separate thread won't stop you guys from wanting to post some NSFW stuff here.

So let's take this to a discussion: what do you all say you want the future of the thread to be?

I say we just keep the old thread but keep it as it were, you guys really only seem to flip out whenever NSFW images are posted as opposed to NSFW discussion, so I'd say make an implied rule where we don't post NSFW pics (unless you explicitly say in your post that you're posting something NSFW). You can leave the NSFW tag up on the topic, but please, guys, just place a warning on your posts for NSFW stuff.

Just what I think should happen, anyways.

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555bc2fb6368723e1b521600#post_555bc2fb6368723e1b521600

Here's what happened. The important thing at least.

User 1 posted a couple NSFW pics
User 2 thought it wouldn't be a good idea despite the fact that they were spoilered and therefore, following the standard procedure as to how the rules tend to work.
User 3 brings this matter to the mods who reasserted the same as the previous point but nonetheless brought the idea that the mod should add the tag for future concerns.

The mod does as such and everyone panics like a monastery fill with 80 year old nuns who saw a girl showing her ankles.

topics.body:
Here's how I see it.

NSFW _images_ should go in the fetish thread unless explicitly spoilered and labeled NSFW, as images usually seem to pertain to fetishes

NSFW _discussion_ can stay here, as most of the time it's just everyone lightheartedly talking dirty to each other and it never seems to get as much of a reaction as images do (but if you are gonna post something more hardcore, spoiler it and label it NSFW as we do with images)

The new thread isn't necessary, honestly. Just stay here so we don't have to pick sides, there's no reason why we can't coexist anymore, nothing much has changed.
